extendedInfo.description: Communication Type Inventory"Most of us interact with others in fixed patterns. When communication breaks down, those established patterns are often to blame.The way by which we interact with others identifies us as one of four communication types:"ControllerAnalyzerSupporterPromoter"By learning your communication type and those of the people around you, you can greatly expand your communication skills.By knowing your communication type you will better understand your patterns of behavior and ways of thinking."You may even discover that people you find hard work with can actually be excellent partners who compensate for qualities that you lack.Why not create a new "communication interface" by taking the Communication Type Inventory? Start by learning about your personality type. Which type are you?
